Complete Lists of Techs
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Techs/Tech Chains: Complete Lists of Techs
To print charts out more effectively, change your browser's View option to smallest size text.


These charts are the result of a project started by Richard Ryley and assisted by me. In the coming days, I shall post the tech charts for all 38 main breeds. This, of course, will be done with Richard Ryley's permission (For record, he did 30 monsters, I've done 8).

Here are the categories:

Name : The name of the move
Type : The move's type (Sharp, Withering, etc..)
Range: The range category of the move (From closest to farthest: Short,Mid,Long,Extreme)
Cost : The amount of Guts needed to execute the move
Stats: The rating of the move in the categories of Force, Hit%, Withering, and Sharpness. The ratings range from E (poor) to S (excellent)
Notes: Miscellaneous data concerning the move in question, for the meaning of the letters, please refer to the "Notes" section of the chart.

The names of the moves will be color-coded according to the stat upon which the move's effectiveness is based. POW based moves will be listed in red while INT based moves will be listed in green.

Tech Chains: This section indicates which of the monster's moves are chained together. The number of times that the move must use used in order to unlock the next move in the chain will be indicated in parentheses.

Notes:: The section lists the meaning of the letter indicated in the Notes section of the main table. If you see letters in the Notes column, refer to the Notes segment at the bottom of the post for more info.

I wished to thank Richard Ryley for investing his time and energy on this project and his permission to post this data here.

Enjoy!
